Duo Consulting

Sponsorship Level: 
Gold
http://www.duoconsulting.com/

Duo utilizes Drupal open-source technologies to create content-rich websites accessible through traditional and mobile platforms. We help businesses and organizations create web sites and social business platforms that use content to attract and inform visitors. Our active Content Marketing Strategy - Content. Leads. Clients. - drives tangible business results.

Duo Consulting core competencies include:

  • Enterprise Drupal Specialists in Chicago
  • User Experience Design for Usability
  • Mobile Website Design and Development
  • Social Networks for Business

Pre-DrupalCamp training opportunity Friday, December 9. Drupal in a Day. Introductory hands-on workshop. Learn more.
